trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000000_ULTIMA<tab>Is it sanctum you seek, my wayward children? Or perhaps you are come in search of power.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000010_ULTIMA<tab>That which lies at your feet─that blessed bauble─can grant you both. You need but will it so.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000020_ULTIMA<tab>Now take up your salvation and begone. Mortal agency in matters divine shall not be suffered.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000100_ULTIMA<tab>I am your mother. I am your maker! I. Am. Ivalice! Consign me unto darkness and your light will be forever lost!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04501_000200_SEIRYU<tab>Prove me wrong, mortals! Make me submit─or die for your insolence!
